trans-unit.source: Provides data for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"></xref> event that occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> moves.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"> </xref> evento que ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> move.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventArgs"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType"></xref> enumeration value and the new location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventArgs"> </xref> classe usando especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType"> </xref> valor de enumeração e o novo local do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> controlar o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType"></xref> enumeration value that describes the type of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> movement that caused the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType"> </xref> valor de enumeração que descreve o tipo de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> movimentação que causou o evento.

trans-unit.source: The value that corresponds to the new location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor correspondente para o novo local do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> no <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Performs the appropriate type casting to call the type-safe <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventHandler"></xref> delegate for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Executa a conversão de tipo apropriado para chamar a segurança de tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventHandler"> </xref> delegar o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"> </xref> eventos.
O manipulador de eventos para chamar.

trans-unit.source: The current object along the event's route.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual ao longo de rota do evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the new location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que representa o novo local do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> no <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The new value corresponds to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control that is implemented for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor corresponde ao valor da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>controle que é implementado para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value that corresponds to the new position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor que corresponde à posição de novo o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> no <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType"></xref> enumeration value that describes the change in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> position that caused this event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType"> </xref> valor de enumeração que descreve a alteração no <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> posição que causou este evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType"></xref> enumeration value that describes the type of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> movement that caused the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType"> </xref> valor de enumeração que descreve o tipo de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> movimentação que causou o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"> </xref> eventos.
